channel.title: What do i download to use javac
channel.description:
im sorry if this is nooby,
im trying to learn java and iv read the tutorial on the sun java website, this link, [url=http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/getStarted/cupojava/win32.html]http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/getStarted/cupojava/win32.html[/url]
its a "hello world" program, on the tutorial it says i need to download, "The Java SE Development Kit 6 (JDK 6)", it provides a link, but on the link theres a whole list of downloads and non of them are called that, i tried downloading a few but every time on command prompt it says that "javac is not an internal or external command"
can someone tell me which to download or post a picture. please dont shout at me, i did my best :(

item.title: What do i download to use javac
item.dc:creator: @googlethis googlethis
item.description:
@googlethis wrote:

It’s here in Java Programming, It’s title is SIDE: Simple IDE 07, it’ll compile, jar, and javadoc for you.

Read full topic
item.source: What do i download to use javac

item.title: What do i download to use javac
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

Or try one of these versions of JDK: http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp

Read full topic
item.source: What do i download to use javac

item.title: What do i download to use javac
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

i downloaded that JDK but it says that its not compatable with my version of windows, i installed it anyway but javac still doesnt work, doesnt matter ill try it on another computer

ill try to find that thing called SIDE…

edit : i couldnt find anything called that, could you explain some more?

Read full topic
item.source: What do i download to use javac

item.title: What do i download to use javac
item.dc:creator: @googlethis googlethis
item.description:
@googlethis wrote:

You can use SIDE for javac.

can someone tell me which to download or post a picture.
